get.summary: Retrieves properties and their comparers that can be used for the attributes endpoint.
get.description: Filtering uses the [FilterSyntax](https://github.com/DigitaleDeltaOrg/dd-eco-api-specs/wiki/Implementation-Topics). Skipproperties can be used to exclude properties from the results.

get.summary: Retrieves attributes, properties of a measurement. This is mostly used in parameters of types taxon and biological groups.
get.description: Filtering uses the [FilterSyntax](https://github.com/DigitaleDeltaOrg/dd-eco-api-specs/wiki/Implementation-Topics). Skipproperties can be used to exclude properties from the results.

dataType.description: Data type allowed for field/comparer combination.

prev.description: Hyperlink of the previous page, if present.

next.description: Hyperlink of the next page, if present.

totalObjectCount.description: Count of all entities that satisfy the filter requirements. Will be left out when nocount=true is specified.

ProviderBlock.description: Gives information regarding the provider of the service.

externalKey.description: The external key can be used to uniquely identify the compartment.

Attribute.description: Describes a attribute of a measurement.

AttributeBaseListResponse.description: Base class for list responses. It is comprised of a block with links, a block with provider data, and a list of entities that are retrieved.

instance.description: Provides information to track the problem at the side of the provider.

Problem.description: Describes the problem the service ran into.

externalKey.description: The external key can be used to uniquely identify the compartment.

Compartment.description: Describes a compartment in which something was measured.

CompartmentBaseListResponse.description: Base class for list responses. It is comprised of a block with links, a block with provider data, and a list of entities that are retrieved.

name.example: Manual import in AquaDesk CSV format

Institute.description: Describes an institute that can define standards.

InstituteBaseListResponse.description: Base class for list responses. It is comprised of a block with links, a block with provider data, and a list of entities that are retrieved.

citation.description: Citation of the literature: authors of the paper.

reference.description: Reference to the literature: consice reference tot the title..
reference.example: Sangster, G., Hazevoet, C.J., Van den Berg, A.B. & Roselaar, C.S. (1998): Dutch avifaunal list: species concepts, taxonomic instability, and taxonomic changes in 1998. Dutch Birding 20(1): 22-32 (CSNA-mededeling).

externalKey.description: The external key can be used to uniquely identify the source.

LiteratureBaseListResponse.description: Base class for list responses. It is comprised of a block with links, a block with provider data, and a list of entities that are retrieved.

numberOfMeasurements.description: Number of measurements to be taken within the cycle.

externalKey.description: The external key can be used to uniquely identify the compartment.

MeasurementCycle.description: Describes a measurement cycle: when and how often samples are taken.

MeasurementCycleBaseListResponse.description: Base class for list responses. It is comprised of a block with links, a block with provider data, and a list of entities that are retrieved.

srId.description: SrId (coordinate system) of the measurement object.

externalKey.description: The external key can be used to uniquely identify the parameter type.

MeasurementObject.description: Describes a location where a sample has been taken.

MeasurementObjectBaseListResponse.description: Base class for list responses. It is comprised of a block with links, a block with provider data, and a list of entities that are retrieved.

externalKey.description: The external key can be used to uniquely identify the source.

MeasurementPackage.description: Describes a measurement package: a composition of items to create the required information for measurements.

MeasurementPackageBaseListResponse.description: Base class for list responses. It is comprised of a block with links, a block with provider data, and a list of entities that are retrieved.

MethodTypeAndCode.description: Describes a combination of measurement method and its type.

calculatedUnit.description: Describes the unit in which the calculated value was expressed.

calculatedValue.description: The value that was calculated, based on the measured value.

classifiedValue.description: Classified value. Used for measurements expressed in quantities that cannot be expressed in numeric values, such as GEUR.

collectionDate.description: Date/time on which the sample was collected. [REQUIRED]

compartment.description: Compartment in which the sample was collected. [REQUIRED]

measuredUnit.description: The unit where the measured value was expressed in.

methods.description: Methods used to gather the sample or determining the measurement.

parameterType.description: The parameter type of the measured entity.

projects.description: Projects that the measurement was performed for.

quantity.description: The quantity that the measurement was expressed in.

status.description:
Status of the measurement. This is a numeric value, indicating the status of a measurement.
- SamplingDone = 25
- SampleInPreparation = 30
- SampleAvailable = 35
- AnalysisInProgress = 40
- AnalysisFinished = 45
- AnalysisValidated = 50
- AnalysisReleased = 55
- AnalysisAccepted = 60
- AnalysisForPublication = 65
- InternalOnly = 70
- AnalysisRejected = 80
- AnalysisPostponed = 85
- AnalysisRemoved = 90

taxonType.description: Taxon type (if parameter is a taxon)

taxonGroup.description: Taxon group (if parameter is a taxon)

measurementSetAttributes.description: Methods used for gathering or analysing the sample. Alias for methods. Deprecated.

externalKey.description: The external key can be used to uniquely identify the measurement.

Measurement.description:
Describes a measurement.
Measurements describe why, what, when, where and how the data was gathered.
- Why: purpose, project
- What:quantity, unit meaured, unit calculated, classified value, measured value, calculated value, attributes.
- When: collection date, measurement date, change date.
- Where: location, location geography, measurement geography.
- How: methods.

MeasurementBaseListResponse.description: Base class for list responses. It is comprised of a block with links, a block with provider data, and a list of entities that are retrieved.

calculatedUnit.description: Describes the unit in which the calculated value was expressed.

calculatedValue.description: The value that was calculated, based on the measured value.

classifiedValue.description: Classified value. Used for measurements expressed in quantities that cannot be expressed in numeric values, such as GEUR.

projects.description: Projects that the measurement was performed for.

status.description:
Status of the measurement. This is a numeric value, indicating the status of a measurement.
- SamplingDone = 25
- SampleInPreparation = 30
- SampleAvailable = 35
- AnalysisInProgress = 40
- AnalysisFinished = 45
- AnalysisValidated = 50
- AnalysisReleased = 55
- AnalysisAccepted = 60
- AnalysisForPublication = 65
- InternalOnly = 70
- AnalysisRejected = 80
- AnalysisPostponed = 85
- AnalysisRemoved = 90

measurementSetAttributes.description: Methods used for gathering or analysing the sample. Alias for methods. Deprecated.

methods.description: Methods used to gather the sample or determining the measurement.

TimeSeriesMeasurement.description:
Describes a measurement.
Measurements describe why, what, when, where and how the data was gathered.
- Why: purpose, project
- What:quantity, unit meaured, unit calculated, classified value, measured value, calculated value, attributes.
- When: collection date, measurement date, change date.
- Where: location, location geography, measurement geography.
- How: methods.

compartment.description: Compartment in which the sample was collected. [REQUIRED]

parameterType.description: The parameter type of the measured entity.

quantity.description: The quantity that the measurement was expressed in.

taxonType.description: Taxon type (if parameter is a taxon)

taxonGroup.description: Taxon group (if parameter is a taxon)
